subject: Weekly Team Standup Notes
snippet: Here are the standup notes from this week's meetings...
text_body:
Hi team,

Here are this week's standup highlights:
- Backend API migration to v3 is 80% complete
- Frontend dashboard redesign on track for Feb release
- QA regression suite updated with 42 new test cases

Action items:
1. Andy: Review PR #482 by Monday
2. Mike: Deploy staging build
3. Lisa: Update API docs

Best,
Sarah
html_body:
Hi team,

Here are this week's standup highlights...

subject: Invoice #INV-2026-0042 from Acme Corp

text_body:
Dear Customer,

You can pay via bank transfer using the details on the attached invoice or through our online portal at https://pay.acmecorp.com

subject: [GitHub] Pull Request Review: Fix auth token refresh logic
snippet: @jdoe requested changes on your pull request #517...
text_body:
@jdoe requested changes on your pull request #517 in repo client-product-dev/angel_email:

Comment on src/angel_email/gmail_auth.py line 45:
> The token refresh should use exponential backoff here. Currently it retries immediately which could hit rate limits.

Comment on src/angel_email/gmail_auth.py line 62:
> Consider adding a max_retries parameter with a sensible default.

View the full review: https://github.com/client-product-dev/angel_email/pull/517
html_body: @jdoe requested changes on your pull request #517...

subject: Re: Support Ticket #88431 - Integration API returning 403
snippet: We've identified the issue with your API integration...
text_body:
Hi Andy,

Thank you for your patience. We've identified the issue with your API integration.

The 403 errors were caused by a recent change to our OAuth scopes. Your application needs to request the 'data:read:v2' scope in addition to the existing ones.

Steps to fix:
1. Update your OAuth configuration to include scope 'data:read:v2'
2. Re-authorize your application
3. Regenerate your access tokens

We've also extended your rate limit to 10,000 requests/hour as a courtesy for the inconvenience.

Please let us know if you need further assistance.

Best regards,
Technical Support Team
Vendor Platform Inc.
html_body:
Hi Andy,

Thank you for your patience. We've identified the issue...
